quote: Hiding from the camera is hiding from clients. You're not selling a home; you're selling yourself.
why_clipworthy: It challenges agents to rethink their approach to video marketing.
suggested_hook: Are you hiding from your clients by avoiding the camera?

quote: Jessica sold $8 million in additional homes by consistently showing up on camera.
why_clipworthy: Demonstrates the tangible impact of video marketing on sales.
suggested_hook: Want to know how video can add millions to your sales?
